content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Iron Ore Mine at position(-17.0, -50.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position (-17.0, -50.0)) and a transport belt at position (-16.5, -51.5)
-  Burner mining drill (position (-15.0, -50.0)) and a transport belt at position (-15.5, -51.5)
-  Burner inserter at position (-13.5, -50.5) that puts into transport belt at position (-14.5, -51.5)
-  Burner inserter at position (-13.5, -48.5) that puts into transport belt at position (-12.5, -48.5)

### Iron Plate Factory at position(-10.0, -49.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Furnace (position (-10.0, -49.0)) that smelts iron ore into iron plate
-  Transport belt group that connects the furnace to the iron ore mine

### Storage at position(-16.5, -47.5)
Consists of following entities
-  Wooden chest (position (-16.5, -47.5)) that stores items
-  Burner inserter at position (-16.5, -46.5) that puts items into the chest

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using inserters but being too far
 -  Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to insert items before inserting
### Errors when placing entities but being out of fuel
 -  Ensure you have enough fuel to place entities before attempting to place
### Errors when using furnaces but having no ingredients
 -  Ensure you have enough ingredients to smelt before attempting to smelt
### Errors when using transport belts but having no output
 -  Ensure you have a sink entity in place to accept the output before attempting to transport

### NAMESPACE
*   `insert_item`: a function that inserts an item into an entity
    *   Failure modes: could not find a nearby entity that can accept the item
    *   Success modes: item inserted successfully
*   `place_entity`: a function that places an entity on the map
    *   Failure modes: out of fuel, entity cannot be placed at the specified position
    *   Success modes: entity placed successfully
*   Important variables:
    *   `inventory`: a dictionary that stores the current inventory of the agent
    *   `entities`: a list that stores the entities on the map
    *   `position`: a tuple that stores the current position of the agent
